remarks: The Cartesian product of an infinite set with itself is idempotent. This theorem provides the basis for infinite cardinal arithmetic. Proposition 10.40 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 95.  See also ~ infxpidm . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
statement: infxpidm2 $p |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ _om ~<_ A ) -> ( A X. A ) ~~ A ) $.
